com.djzass.medipoint.logic_database

Class AccountDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djzass.medipoint.logic_database.DbDAO
      • com.djzass.medipoint.logic_database.AccountDAO

  • public class AccountDAO
extends DbDAO
    Created by Deka on 26/3/2015. AccountDAO is the data access object of the Account model. It provides access to an underlying database for Account objects.
    Since:
    2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Shreyas
